message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SY

This paper discusses a hardware-assisted solution for memory safety violations, which is relevant to the sub-category of computer security (cs.CR). It also involves an empirical study of the Intel MPX architecture, which falls under the sub-category of computer architecture (cs.AR). Additionally, the paper evaluates the performance and usability issues of the solution, which relates to the sub-categories of software engineering (cs.SE) and programming languages (cs.PL). Finally, the paper discusses the limitations of Intel MPX in multithreaded code, which is relevant to the sub-category of systems and control (cs.SY).
